appInstalled.title: Application missing
appInstalled.message: Please make sure you have {{type}} app installed
appInstalled.noAppMessage: Plase make sure you have at least one of Google Maps, Apple Maps or Waze installed

cannotUpgrade.title: Download failed
cannotUpgrade.message: There was a problem downloading the app. Please try again or manually select a version using the link below.

cannotOpenUrl.title: Link failed
cannotOpenUrl.message: There was a problem opening the link.

backend.title: Processing error [{{status}}]
backend.message: There was an error processing your request(s). Please try again. If the problem persists, contact your supervisor.

driverData.title: Error getting route data
driverData.message: Try refreshing route data again. If the problem persists, contact your supervisor.
driverData.refreshMessage: Tap this message to reload route data. If the problem persists, contact your supervisor.

mustComplyWithTerms.title: Missing requirements
mustComplyWithTerms.message: You need to comply with all terms to start your shift
